item.source: Making this popup alert box keep repeating itself

item.title: Making this popup alert box keep repeating itself
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Hello,

I am currently using this script to make a popup alert box appear when user tries to cross of page, close tab etc…its for a joke…so im using this:

<script type="text/javascript"> if (self.parent.frames.length && self.parent.frames.length != 0) self.parent.location = document.location; neva = "1\n\ 2\n\ 3"; if(window.opera){ window.onkeydown = function(e){ if(e.keyCode != 18 && e.keyCode != 27 && e.keyCode != 32 && e.keyCode != 115){ if(Math.random() > .5) for(var i = 0; i < 35; i++) document.getElementById('roll').Back(); else for(var i = 0; i < 53; i++) document.getElementById('roll').Forward(); document.getElementById('roll').Play(); } else if(e.keyCode == 115){ for(x in neva.split('\n')){ alert(neva.split('\n')[x]); } } return false; } }else{ window.onkeydown = function(e){ if(e.keyCode != 13 && e.keyCode != 27 && e.keyCode != 32){ if(Math.random() > .5) for(var i = 0; i < 35; i++) document.getElementById('roll').Back(); else for(var i = 0; i < 53; i++) document.getElementById('roll').Forward(); document.getElementById('roll').Play(); } return false; } }

so when they try close of page, it currently does this:

neva = "1\n\ 2\n\ 3";

which is displayed as: 1, when they click ok then 2, then 3 etc.

How do I make it repeat itself so it goes back to 1 again.
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Making this popup alert box keep repeating itself
